mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_equipment e LEFT JOIN p_project p ON p.eq_id=e.id LEFT JOIN t_equipment_type AS u ON e.eq_type_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_unit AS n ON e.unit_id = n.id where 1 = 1
and e.id = #{id}
and e.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}),'%')
and p.pname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pname}),'%')
and e.uuid LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{uuid}),'%')
and p.address LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{address}),'%')
and substr(e.create_time,1,10) BETWEEN #{statdate} and #{enddate}
ORDER by e.create_time desc

SELECT count(*) value, substring_index(substring_index(p.address,',',3),',', 1) name FROM p_project p INNER JOIN t_equipment e ON p.eq_id=e.id GROUP BY substring_index(substring_index(p.address,',',3),',', 1);

SELECT count(*) value, substring_index(substring_index(p.address,',',3),',',2) name FROM p_project p INNER JOIN t_equipment e ON p.eq_id=e.id GROUP BY substring_index(substring_index(p.address,',',3),',', 2);

SELECT count(*) value, substring_index(substring_index(p.address,',',3),',', 3) name FROM p_project p INNER JOIN t_equipment e ON p.eq_id=e.id GROUP BY substring_index(substring_index(p.address,',',3),',', 3);
